VIII.iv.4.A.10.d
.
Temporary Total Ratings Used to Award SMC (s)
Temporary evaluations of 100 percent under
38 CFR 4.28
,
38 CFR 4.29
, and
38 CFR 4.30
of the
Rating Schedule
may be used as a basis for awarding SMC at the housebound rate.
Example
:
A Veteran SC for a knee disability is awarded a temporary total evaluation under
38 CFR 4.30
for two months following surgery.  The Veteran is SC for PTSD, which is rated 70-percent disabling.  SMC (s) will also be awarded while the total rating under
38 CFR 4.30
is in effect, as the separate PTSD evaluation of 70 percent establishes the basis for award of SMC at the housebound rate.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
